name: Spider-Man: L'uomo Ragno: Destino incrociato
overview: An Italian language game with a mix of Adventure and Beat 'm up elements. Spiderman - Episodio 3: Destino Incrociato! ("Entwined Destiny!" - note that Dr. Doom is called "Dottor Destino" in Italy) or L'Uomo Ragno: Destino Incrociato! is a point-and-click adventure with action elements. It was developed by Italian company Simulmondo. It is the third and last part of Simulmondo's series of episodic Spiderman adventures. It also came out for Amiga. As far as I know, all episodes where only released in Italian language. This time, Dr. Doom sets out to steal a precious emerald from a museum in New York. He needs the stone for his latest scheme to take over the world. While being a point-and-click adventure, the game also features direct controls. Occasionally, Spiderman has to fight villains, and their some fighting mechanics for that. Spiderman can punch or use his web sling as weapon. He can also duck, jump and run.
